original_title: Swimming in a Sea of Trauma
overview: A ghost story about the memories of the Biafran War.  Chisom encounters Nkechi in a dreamscape; a girl with an otherworldly and strange demeanor. Through their encounter, Chisom learns that Nkechi is a wandering spirit who lived and died during the Biafran War/Nigerian Civil War.
title: Swimming in a Sea of Trauma
